def_cn: （用于名词后构成形容词）表示“有…特性的”
def_en: -y is added to nouns in order to form adjectives that describe something or someone as having the characteristics of what the noun refers to.

def_cn: （用于颜色词后构成形容词）表示“大致…色的”，“略带…色的”
def_en: -y is added to colours in order to form adjectives that describe something as being roughly that colour or having some of that colour in it.

def_cn: （用于名称或名词后，表示喜爱或亲昵）
def_en: -y is added to a name or a noun in order to give it a more affectionate or familiar form.
